text: Sure, I’ll sign. But I want to know why @WHO @UNICEF keep validating #AdvanceMarketCommitments #AMCs while @PhRMA runs with the money + doesn’t honor committed volumes/timing (price?) of #vaccine supply. Happened with PCVs, happening now. @gavi? @gatesfoundation? #COVAX #covid19 https://t.co/3k0Kdjxcit
